Fixed Price Work Agreements
Fixed Price Work Agreements are compiled taking into account the investigation of the work required, trusted trade knowledge of the likely and potential outcomes, trade accredited bodies requirements such are evidence and certification, alongside any registrations that we must undertake.
Regardless of the task taking less, or more time than calculated for, the charge to you will remain the same.
Only if the scope of work is required to change, will we be required to discuss a change in costs with you, prior to proceeding.
Some examples, which could cause this outcome would be, uncovering structural or component damage, adjustment to the request from our customers, or where findings were previously concealed such as a pre-existing leak under the floor.
For more information, please check our terms and conditions.
How We Charge for the Job
We have now received a 50% deposit for the value of the works. Any remaining balance is due upon completion of the works. Once we have obtained authorization from you for completion of the works, the remaining balance will be taken form the last card you provided us with. If you wish to amend these details, please contact us, and we will ensure this occurs.
Our Cancellation Policy
If you want to cancel your booking, you may be charged a cancellation fee. For more information pleas see our terms and conditions. .
Happy with the job done?
Your our number one priority, so if your not happy with the work, whatever the reason, please get in touch straight away.
We are always keen to understand if we have been able to meet or surpass your exceptions, If you wish to provide insight into your experience with us, you are welcome to complete our 'Community Experience' survey. We ensure we meet regularly to explore this feedback and improve our communities experience. While providing feedback to all of our operatives regarding their specific attendances.
